title: Support mounting removable USB/CD/DVD drives
body: Support for removable USB/CD/DVD drives would be nice

comments.body: I have WSL installed on six Win 10 computers, each with a 2nd D: partition (3), hard drive (2), or mounted flash drive (1). On each machine, I have a mklink junction from a folder on the C: drive, to another folder on the D: drive. This all works great in Windows. After installing Debian on all six, on the first five machines, I see both /mnt/c & mnt/d, and the junctions appear as Linux soft links & work great in Linux.
